Title: Revenge
Plot: Tommy takes one step forward by convincing Janet to leave Roger but two steps backward when she stumbles onto his latest fling. The boys convince Sean to date a woman but neglect to tell him that she is actually a he. Franco discovers he can't shake his newfound fatherly instincts.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,offensive language,drug use and sex scenes
GuestStars: Susan A. Ashton,  Matthew Arkin,  Patricia Mauceri,  Clarke Thorell,  Julie Boyd,  John Sica,  Jeff Goldstein,  Michelle Hurst,  P.J. Morrison,  Mateo Gomez,  Jorne Gilbert,  Chris Edwards,  Shannon Roche
